attributes.additional_details: after just having my horse killed by a driver whilst out hacking , we are now campaigning for horse and rider safety on roads, we are not respected by motorists and our lives are put in danger daily, i think its time the government recognised this problem and worked with the equine community so we can be herd ,this is a national problem that we are very passionate about, we are working hard now to raise this support and have had 1200 members in just 2 days to our campaign

rejection.details: There have been three e-petitions on the topic of horse riders today.  However, the other two made specific calls for action (a TV advertising campaign and changes to the driving test).  You may wish to resubmit your e-petition with a specific action you wish central Government to take.
